heading: 11.2.3 Loading data
text: Function pip_load_data takes care loading data. first instruction within pip_load_data find data avialable repository using pip_load_inventory(). difference however two-fold. df <- pip_load_data(country = "PRY", year = c(2014, 2015), tool = "PC")
